tourBios.curYrHigh: T55th at the 2013 Times Colonist Island Savings Open
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Finished 4th at the 2004 World Amateur Championships in Puerto Rico
tourBios.otherInfo: Has won a number of tournaments in Switzerland, Had multiple Top-10 finishes on the EPD Tour

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada was T26th in 2012 at the ATB Financial Classic presented by TELUS.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T25th in Consecutive Cuts on the PGA TOUR Canada.
